transcript_chunks.text: because the other day when i was in canada right i woke up we don't need to bring this we don't even talk about this is that a postcard from greg who's to say who's it from you know why is it torn well it didn't let me know who it was from but coincidentally the same taylor swift postcard that was sent to me last year uh and on the back it says andy that greg is not what he seems ladies and gentlemen the jury i ask when i write that about myself near my edge it's just andy andy andy andy andy andy a bunch of times and then it says goodbye imran with uh taylor swift her sort of eyes crossed out and i don't know what this means what the [ __ ] is wrong with what does that mean i love it i'm no batman or anything but it seems like it's trust spell trust spelled backwards oh that's bad really what it means wow i'll tell you what that's just joking keeps on kidding i'll admit it i'll come clean i sent it it was greg whoa oh wow it was great and i didn't like right before we went to canada i

it means wow i'll tell you what that's just joking keeps on kidding i'll admit it i'll come clean i sent it it was greg whoa oh wow it was great and i didn't like right before we went to canada i just set it up with a bunch of bills since we forgot about it
